verses.verse: Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> art to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> thyself, <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and fenced <S%H1219>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>

A <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7311>tall,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakims,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest,<s%> and of whom <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> say, <S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak!<s%>

Understand <S%H3045><s%> therefore this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H1931>he<s%> which goeth <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; as a <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall bring them <S%H3665>down<s%> before thy <S%H6440>face:<s%> so shalt thou drive them <S%H3423>out,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> them <S%H4118>quickly,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> unto thee.

Speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou in thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> after that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath cast them <S%H1920>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> For my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath brought me <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> but for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee.

Not <S%H3808><s%> for thy <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> or for the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> dost <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> doth drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, and <S%H4616>that<s%> he may <S%H6965>perform<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

Understand <S%H3045><s%> therefore, <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it for thy <S%H6666>righteousness;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> and <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>how<s%> thou <S%H7107>provokedst<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> to wrath in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou didst <S%H3318>depart<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> ye <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> ye have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Also in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> ye <S%H7107>provoked<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to wrath, so that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with you to have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you.

When I was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mount<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> even the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you, then I <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights,<s%> I <S%H3808>neither<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> with the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> them was written according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7093><s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H853>me<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> even the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> get thee <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> from <S%H4480>hence;<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt<s%> <S%H4714><s%> have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> themselves; they are <S%H4118>quickly<s%> turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them; they have <S%H6213>made<s%> them a molten <S%H4541>image.<s%>

Furthermore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

Let me <S%H7503>alone,<s%> <S%H4480><s%> that I may <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, and blot <S%H4229>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> of thee a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6099>mightier<s%> and <S%H7227>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> they.

So I <S%H6437>turned<s%> and came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> were <S%H5921>in<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> ye had <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and had <S%H6213>made<s%> you a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf:<s%> ye had turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

And I <S%H8610>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights:<s%> I did <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> in <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H7451>wickedly<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I was <S%H3025>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> and hot <S%H2534>displeasure,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you. But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was very <S%H599>angry<s%> <S%H3966><s%> with <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> him: and I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

And I <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H2403>sin,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H3807>stamped<s%> it, and <S%H2912>ground<s%> it very <S%H3190>small,<s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834>it<s%> was as <S%H1854>small<s%> as <S%H6083>dust:<s%> and I <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> thereof <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> that <S%H3381>descended<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>
And at <S%H8404>Taberah,<s%> and at <S%H4532>Massah,<s%> and at <S%H6914>Kibroth-hattaavah,<s%> ye <S%H7107>provoked<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to wrath.

Likewise when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> you from <S%H4480>Kadesh-barnea,<s%> <S%H6947><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you; then ye rebelled <S%H4784>against<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and ye <S%H539>believed<s%> him <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to his <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
Ye have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from the <S%H4480>day<s%> <S%H3117><s%> that I <S%H3045>knew<s%> you.

Thus I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> at the first; <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> he would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you.

I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> therefore <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> through thy <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt<s%> <S%H4714><s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> <S%H6437>look<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7190>stubbornness<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> nor <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> nor <S%H413>to<s%> their sin: <S%H2403><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whence<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8034><s%> thou broughtest us <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> Because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not <S%H4480>able<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H3201><s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>promised<s%> them, and because he <S%H4480>hated<s%> <S%H8135><s%> them, he hath brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

Yet <S%H1992>they<s%> are thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou broughtest <S%H3318>out<s%> by thy <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by thy stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm.<s%>
